website_summaries.verdict: An affordable sound machine with 6 classic sounds to choose from. Small design is easy to pack in luggage.
pros: This is a basic sound machine that works well and has an auto shut-off timer
Sounds can be changed using the six built-in buttons
Works well for adults or young children
cons: The volume knob is finicky, and the sound may increase or decrease in intensity

customer_reviews.title: Volume knob unreliable, but there’s a fix...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t last long... but there’s a fix. We’ve been through 5 of these in about 6 years. With each, the volume dial becomes less and less reliable, randomly turning off in the middle of the night. That being said, remove the 4 screws from the bottom and spray electric contact cleaner on the bottom of the volume knob. This has fully resolved the volume issue for over a year Contact cleaner: CRC 05103 QD Electronic Cleaner -11 Wt Oz
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase for night and nap time ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing is ever bought for night time and nap time for the kids! It works great and the sounds are so soothing. I leave it on form 8pm until 8am every day and I have not had a problem with it at all. There is a timer though if you want to set it which is also nice. I give this product 5 stars!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Volume knob breaks easily, use a wall switch to make it last longer
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 kids and these really help them sleep in a noisy household. Unfortunately, as is evident from many other reviews, they're poorly made and the on/off volume dial easily breaks and renders it useless. My workaround is to use a wall switch or wired switch that attaches between the plug for the noise machine and the wall - this means you don't ever need to turn the knob, and it will last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Hercules Rockefeller

customer_reviews.title: Sound chip is faulty and breaks too easily
customer_reviews.text: We've gone through four of these in the last 10 months or so. It's great for the first month, but then the pieces inside become loose and the sound won't turn on unless you wiggle the volume dial just right (tap on the bottom edge a bit until the sound stays on), and occasionally it just turns itself off even without the timer setting is on. That is, until eventually it stops working altogether. (You can hear loose pieces moving around inside once they fall apart.) The lifespan of each machine is between 1-5 months overall.
customer_reviews.author: NahteLexi

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw with dial
customer_reviews.text: This broke after 6 months - at first you had to jiggle the handle to get it to turn on. Then more and more often, the sound would cut out in the middle of the night. Since we used this for our 2 year old, and the sound suddenly cutting out would wake her up, you can imagine how annoyed this made us. Eventually, it was almost impossible to turn on. Judging by other reviews, this seems to be a design flaw - save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I been using this for bedtime and naps (almost all day long with 2 little ones) for the past 11 months and it's still going strong. When I really pay attention to the sound I can hear a pattern/ loop that sometimes makes it hard for me to fall asleep but I'm the only one who notices it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Weird White Noise Loop
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a great concept. The back-up battery function is a life-saver for when the power goes out (the last thing you want is your child to wake up when there is no power) or when there is no outlet available on travel. However, the white noise plays weird 3-second loop with almost a subtle alarm sound - so it isn't peaceful or restful, it is actually maddening. Luckily, my toddler can't complain but I often turn the baby monitor's sound off when I'm working during naptime and have to keep checking thru the video. Everything either than the white noise sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissyFly

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the 2 months that it worked!
customer_reviews.text: Within 2 months of using this sound machine, the knob started not always turning it on. It will skip and if you jiggle the knob it will work. It just keeps getting worse and worse. The other day it shut off in the middle of my daughter's nap! Instant wake up! It is very frustrating. Too bad it is no longer able to be returned! I expected this to last a lot longer then a few months. Other then that, the ocean sound is great and works very well for naps and night time.
customer_reviews.author: stewartt

customer_reviews.title: It was good at first
customer_reviews.text: It was good at first... When i got this sound machine I was very happy with it. It has numerous sound selections to choose from, it worked well and was loud enough to cover the television noise in the next room. I purchased the sound spa about a year ago and it gradually became useless. The volume button is also the on and off button and when you turn it up it became static and then just quits. I began having problems with it about 3 months after I purchased it and it quit entirely around the 11 month mark. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chb548s

customer_reviews.title: Not a true white noise machine
customer_reviews.text: The "white noise" feature of this machine is not true white noise. True white noise is a steady, consistent noise (like the sound a fan makes blowing air) that drowns out background noise allowing the user to sleep. What HoMedics has inexplicably done is have their "white noise" feature introduce random bouts of clicking or other irregular noise patterns that never fail to wake me up at odd hours. Apparently other users have experienced the same thing, I wish I had read those reviews before buying this. Unfortunately I didn't pin down the white noise defect until well after the return window, so I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After 18 Months
customer_reviews.text: It worked okay for a year and a half, and then stopped working. What happens... when you turn it on, it seems to work, but then slowly loses volume and gains distortion over the several hours. It then goes completely silent until you turn it off and on again. This makes it unacceptable for consistent use through the night. I can not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought a better one instead of trying to save money.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. After a month or so, the sound started to short in and out. It was waking my daughter up because it would cut out and then start again. Now it only works well if the volume is up super loud. If it's quieter, it will go in and out. You have to jiggle the volume button to get it to work and even then it's hit or miss. Have to buy something else now. Do yourself a favor and spend a little more and get one that actually works instead of this junk.
customer_reviews.author: TessaMarlys

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Broke after only a few uses. Almost caught on fire!! Never used longer than 3 hours for my sons naps only. I want my money back I’m so angry!! Could have burnt my house down
customer_reviews.author: Sonia O. Colon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought me this for Christmas one year because I was freezing him in the winter by sleeping with a fan on. So I tried it instead of freezing him out and I love it! When we travel I take it with me. Our 18 month old knows that sound means it's time to go to sleep and he'll go turn it on. So we bought one for his room, too, lol. I love this "noise maker". I seriously don't know how I slept without it before. If you're like me and need just a little noise to sleep better and it's too cold for a fan or you don't have one, this really works.
customer_reviews.author: Drink

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine, with limitations; 7 years later became unusable
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought one of these in 2013 and it worked fine out of the box. Like most similar machines, the loops of sound will become identifiable/irritating if you listen to them for long enough. White noise is a constant sound; babbling brook, rainfall, etc are loops, some better than others. Over time, this machine became unreliable to turn on and the volume knob was ineffective. Still, we kept it and messed with it for seven years, so we got our money out of it.
customer_reviews.author: One Person

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: This product works well when it works. However, it doesn't last long. My daughter is 1 years old and we have had to order 2 of these already. We thought maybe the first one had a bad cord...replaced it and nothing. Still we bought another one and thought maybe it was just a one time circumstance... we were wrong. Went to turn on the newer one after using it for maybe 4 months and nothing again. Maybe you'll have better luck but I would spend a little more if the product will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: debbie rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns/toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using a different model of white noise machine since he was born, so when I found out that we are expecting baby #2 I realized I needed a second white noise machine so I can get him/her used to sounds while sleeping. I saw this one at a great price and jumped on it, and it's GREAT! I love all the different sounds it can produce and the volume control works perfectly! Tip for parents: keep a set of batteries in or near the machine, in case of a power outage!
customer_reviews.author: Katie P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Homedics sound machine. I previously purchased a batteries-only-operated sound machine for my son. When my daughter saw it, she wanted one, too. However, my husband wanted us to find one that operated with an a/c plug so that we wouldn’t have to purchase batteries as often. If I had known about this one first, I would have purchased this brand over the other. The volume control is nice, the timer feature is great, and it seems to help our daughter with falling asleep. It’s also an attractive design and doesn’t seem obtrusive on her bedside table.
customer_reviews.author: BlendedFamilyofSix

customer_reviews.title: I thought I loved this sound machine
customer_reviews.text: I thought I loved this sound machine...I used to recommend it to our friends/family who were having our baby. Our first sound machine did pretty well, lasted for 2 years after our daughter was born. We had it on all night long and a lot of the day so I felt it lived up to it's end of the bargain. However, when we went to replace it (because it stopped turning on, and we NEED the sound machine for our now 3.5 year old to sleep) the new one lasted about 3 months! Now it has trouble turning on. I am off to find a different model and would caution anyone purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Wifler

customer_reviews.title: Best budget noise machine.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I highly recommend this noise machine for new parents, because it’s great for sleep training and it’s budget friendly. This has become a staple in our home. We have purchased this model several times (the power cord shorts out if it gets knocked around too much), because you just can’t beat the sound for the price. It has a nice quality white noise to drown out sleep disturbances. The size makes it great for traveling. The battery power option is such a life saver when the power goes out! It’s frustrating that it shorts out so easily, but the price makes it feasible to replace regularly. Cheap enough to put one in every bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Looped sounds, background noises at volume
customer_reviews.text: I wish the sound clips weren’t looping. You can hear strange noises in the background of each sound when at a moderate volume. It is as if the recording for the sounds was done in a city with background noises that weren’t edited out. I like the fact that it is easy to use and can run on four AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical

customer_reviews.title: Used every night for 2.5 years and still going.
customer_reviews.text: We have this for our 2.5 y/o, and he's been using it since we brought him home from the hospital! We love it so much that we bought an identical one for our second baby. I specifically love that it has the option to use batteries. We keep it plugged in at home and just pop batteries in it when we take it on road trips or vacations. Battery life is great! We've never had it die on us even when using it all night every night for a week-long vacation. In fact, we keep the same batteries in it for a few vacations with no issue. Needless to say, we recommend.
customer_reviews.author: The Smiths

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by my Audiologist to block out my Pulsatile Tinnitus which is a type of thumping, pulsing, throbbing or whooshing noise that only I can hear, that is in time with my heartbeat. It was driving me crazy. Had my hearing tested & also had an Ultrasound of my Carotid Arteries checked . She thinks it was a result of loud Concerts that I attended & no hearing aids would correct this problem. The Sound Spa Machine did the trick. Now when it is quiet in my house & I hear that noise in my ears I turn on the Machine & it blocks the noise. I especially love the Brook & the Summer Night sounds!.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but then......
customer_reviews.text: Great product for about a month. I used this in my childrens room to help them sleep. Loved the sounds and the fact that you can set it to turn off on it's own, but after a little over a month, the sound distorted and skips really bad. I put brand new batteries in it thinking that may be the cause , but it wasn't. What a waste of money, for a product to only function for a little over a month. I want to get them a replacement, but is really hesitant because I dont want something like this to happen again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: I've used a Brookstone white noise machine for almost thirty years and my third one, just died on me. I received my Homedics white noise machine, today and have to say that I'm thrilled. The sound is really great, it's lightweight for travel, and it can run all night long without the timer set. I am really happy with this purchase as to the price and quality. Our Granddaughter has used one for several years and it has held up quite well. After reading some negative reviews, I purchased anyway, because I think they are rare, and Amazon has a reasonable return policy, so you're not stuck, if you're not pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: CG Sassy 1

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap. You get exactly what you pay for. This was my first attempt at buying a sound machine. The sounds are pretty digital/tin-can sounding and loop about every 8 seconds. I found that distracting, but nobody else noticed. So, I gave this one to my kids and bought one of the Dream Eggs  Double the price, but totally worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Oertel

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and have been using them less than nine months. At first they both worked great. However, after a few months they started being harder to turn on and actually get sound. Now they are cutting out and the sound will stop randomly. This is very bad news if your infant is dependent on it and often wakes up when the noise stops! I thought they must be good with all the good reviews. But the two have have were bought about three months apart and both have the same issue. One is just getting worse than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Grahl

customer_reviews.title: Sound cuts out randomly
customer_reviews.text: I really loved (and wanted to love) this sound machine for our newborn - when it is working anyway. The sound frequently cuts out for no reason (it's turned on and no one touches it) and we have to tap/nudge/push on it to get it to turn on again. We're very disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Jcklinn

customer_reviews.title: Not sold on this
customer_reviews.text: I had a small homemedics sound machine that I liked better. I really only use the white noise and on this one it is too high pitched. Also, when I turn the volume up, I can hear another noise coming out of the machine- like a buzzing and it’s very annoying. If you use other sounds, you might like it. It is flat but about the size of a salad plate.
customer_reviews.author: luvreading

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This thing was great while it lasted. I bought it when i first brought my baby home to help drown out noises and to help her sleep. The volume was nice and loud and I used it pretty much all night for the last 5 months until it stopped working all of a sudden when I was putting her to bed tonight. As a parent, anything that helps your child sleep is essential so for it to stop working when I really need it is pretty frustrating. Currently on the search for something that will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: N H

customer_reviews.title: Three of six have failed because of bad rheostat in volume control
customer_reviews.text: I have bought six of these over the years, three from Amazon and three from BB&B. Three have failed in less than a year. The rheostat (the electronics under the volume knob) has gone bad in three of them making them unusable. We bought the first ones and bought others because we liked the small size and the sounds. One went bad. We thought it was a fluke, so ordered a replacement. Then another went bad and i bought a replacement. Now, a third has gone bad, always the same component. Don't wast your money. Try a different noise machine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pitts

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for I guess...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the white noise sound is pretty awful. We live near train tracks so it’s pretty important to have something to filter out the noise. The sound is choppy and there’s a strange rhythm that I can’t stop hearing. It’s very annoying. Not sure I’ll be keeping this one.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: 2 have broken - Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: I must give this two stars as I have bought two and both broke. The dial broke on each within a year. On the second one in only a couple of months. now I need to fiddle with it to get it set and when you are trying to get a toddler down to sleep it is the last thing you want to do. The sound is great, and I like the sound options but I can't recommend in good conscious due to faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: JXC

customer_reviews.title: Great for canceling out disturbing sounds nearby, very peaceful, has positive effect on wellbeing.
customer_reviews.text: It's so small with so much great quality sound that goes either enjoyably loud or enjoyably quiet. If someone is in the next room talking always or listening to loud television, just turn this on and it fades it out completely without being distracting at all. I like listening to the sounds of the beach or rain or stream or wind. It's just a positive influence to have around. It also helps to clear the mind in a good way to let thoughts come through clearly instead of too much overthinking or stress or anxiety. Amazing what just a positive sound can do for life and the mind. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Walsh

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful, useful item for babies!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson (now 20 months old) received this as a birth gift from my cousin. What a WONDERFUL gift this has been!!! Everything about it is good. Our baby loves to sleep each night with the rain and thunder choice; it soothes him to sleep. The unit is small and light ---- easy to take along when he and family are spending the night away from home. I just bought one for our pastor who is expecting her first child in January. I let her know about all of the great features this product includes and how much our baby loves it. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane E. Oliva

customer_reviews.title: Worked for the first 9ish months
customer_reviews.text: We used this sound machine every night for my daughter. It worked great for the first 9 months or so, but began skipping sounds and shutting off. Now, I have to play around with it to get it to work--I turn the knob, push the knob, sometimes turn in off again and back on, etc... It's frustrating that it stopped working properly. I am giving this a 3-star rating. I would like to think for the money, the machine would work longer than it did. I have yet to find a replacement that I like, though.
customer_reviews.author: BoScha

customer_reviews.title: Used nightly
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several of these over the past 10 years. They always last several years and need replacing and we always have an extra for travelling. Honestly considering it's used every single night, it's not surprising that they eventually stop working. My son cannot sleep without this, he likes it on the white noise sound which got renamed a few years ago so off the top of my head I can't remember what it's called. I think it is called white noise but they used to call it waterfall a few years ago.
customer_reviews.author: MBC737 OYME

customer_reviews.title: so-so, not the best option
customer_reviews.text: Within one month of use, the knob seemed to get loose, resulting in intermittent re-starts. Ever so often, have to bang on the top to get it to stay on. Other drawbacks include odd high-pitched background noises mixed in with the rain recording and slight pauses when the loop plays on repeat (hard to notice at first, but it gets annoying quickly). In addition, the power cord gets very hot sometimes... and now I'm looking to replace this model with something else. This product is OK as a starter noise machine, to see if this type of tool will help you stay sleep better, but it's not a long-term option for something you'll need to play every night.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: no brainer!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this simple and effective noise machine so much that my mom bought the exact same one to use for baby at her house! the ease of use is great- its simple on/off volume switch is just so nice to flip on and let her rip- nothing to fuss with when you're already dealing with a fussy baby. I was also happy to know after a bit of research that the maximum volume level of this machine is below that which researchers say would damage baby's ears- but it is still loud enough to do the trick and keep baby from waking from household noise and loud city noise outside our windows.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: portable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little machine for toting around because it is sleek, small, and easily portable. I like that it can use batteries or electricity. What I don't like is the type of sound used for white noise. It's abrasive and it kind of pulsates, which I find annoying. But of you are going for ocean waves or another type of sound, this is a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: if you need to sleep OR RELAX - this may help
customer_reviews.text: A simple and portable device, easy to use. Add batteries or use the provided AC adapter. It has six pre programmed settings. During the day in my office i put it on the OCEAN waves sound. At night to shut off my brain I put it on the SOFT RAIN sound. It also has a timer to automatically shut off but I leave it on. Medications are not any more effective or in alot of ways worse. Change the sound to thunder or white noise or a summers night to just RELAX after some stress. For what it offers peace of mind, you cannot beat the price and value.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very sensitive cords.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these a couple of years ago. One lasted about 6 months and then started having issues with the cord shorting out. Eventually, it just stopped working all together. The other one is now having the same problem. Also, the "white noise" selection is very sharp. Not a super comfortable sound. It would be better to have multiple choices of the white noise. We are replacing both with a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kennel

customer_reviews.title: SImple Machine
customer_reviews.text: The machine works fine for me. It arrived brand new and undamaged. It is simple to use. There is a timer on the machine. If you don't turn on the timer it just plays continuously. The noise that comes out is clear. I like the different options for noise. The rain and summer are my favorite, helps me sleep the best. The machine can be battery operated or plugged in. The one bad feature for this machine is the volume knob. Its not very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: California Guy

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable:  Fades in and out onits own.
customer_reviews.text: There is a problem (possibly the wiring): the sound fades in and out on its own. It just dies, or gets dramatically quieter, or bounces higher... sometimes this happens when the nightstand is bumped. Sometimes it’s restored when I hit the nightstand hard. Sometimes I hurt my hand in the night trying to pound the nightstand until this gizmo comes back on... So frustrating! This didn’t start happening right away, we’d owned it a good while before it went on the fritz.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: This thing is indispensable in our house
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. We used to sleep with a fan on for the noise but we bought this and it quickly became indispensable. We save a lot on electricity by using this instead. This is awesome for traveling as it’s easy to bring to a hotel instead of trying to pack a fan or hoping that the room AC has a continuous fan feature. Great for drowning out excess outside noise and getting deeper sleep! My wife decided she liked it so much I had to go out and buy a second one for when I take business trips so she could keep using this one at home.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas P Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is better than others at comparable price. We put some black tape over the light because that was bothering me. We've had a couple of these and after about 2 years, the sound starts cutting in and out at lower volumes, but that's just a minor annoyance. We keep it pretty loud anyway. It has to be plugged in or have batteries - doesn't work by charging it. It's been great with both my kids when they were babies and we kept using as they got older to help them sleep through storms and other nighttime noises.
customer_reviews.author: nutsaboutbooks

customer_reviews.title: Small but versatile white sound machine that can go everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these machines about 10 years ago that I let a family member borrow - it was never returned. I'm very happy to have purchased a new one for me - I'd forgotten how much I enjoy falling to sleep with this machine on. My favorite noise is the sound of rain. I like that it has an auto off timer, but equally important is that it can run off an adapter as I usually run the machine all night long (batteries wear out quickly).
customer_reviews.author: LaLise F

customer_reviews.title: Great little noise machine
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve bought this noise machine after the first one wore out because I love it so much. It lasted for many years. It’s easy to use, has a few good choices for sounds but not so many that it gets confusing. It’s not super small so if you’re looking for a major space saver you might want something else but it’s by no means huge either. I have it on my nightstand along with a light, books, all sorts of stuff and it’s not in the way. My whole family uses this.
customer_reviews.author: L. Larue

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable - Breaks down quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in August to use in my young child's bedroom at night. I run it all night long. It's only been three months and it is already breaking down and giving unreliable performance. When I turn the knob to turn it on, it doesn't turn on right away. I have to keep turning it on and off until it finally "registers" that I have turned it on. I have to turn it up very slowly too, or it will turn off suddenly and I have to start the process all over again. I do not recommend this sound machine.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie D.

customer_reviews.title: Best value sound machine
customer_reviews.text: After almost six years, we had to replace this sound machine with a new one. I briefly considered trying something different, but this was the best value in my opinion. It comes with an AC adapter, so I don't have to rely on batteries, it has a variety of sound options, (including ocean, which is my family's preference), and it lasted almost six years of daily use without an issue. Not only that, but we frequently forgot to turn it off for long periods of the day (i.e., between wake up and nap time or between nap and bedtime). I hope the new one is as high quality as the old one!
customer_reviews.author: LSPS

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, volume knob too short
customer_reviews.text: Gets loud and the white noise sound is nice and linear, not droning or a looping sound clip, but the volume knob is too short. I had to 3D print a taller knob to be more functional to turn up. It’s also annoying having to turn a volume knob to turn on. I don’t have it up all the way so I have to turn to the right volume every time. A power button would be cheap and easy and make it much better, so I could keep the volume to the setting I want.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwells

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like exploding gadgets!
customer_reviews.text: Literally exploded!! Popped loud several times& the sound was still going after all power was removed. Glad it didnt hurt anyone. Went on the dumpster. Total waste of money. ★ from Jennifer F. on March 15, 2018 Soft?! Soft as sandpaper 🙄 These are super rough, so great if you want to exfoliate. These are super rough, so they may good for cleaning your house or for thoroughly exfoliating your your skin, but they are FAR from soft! Don't be fooled by the title and description of these! If you found my review to be helpful, pleas click the "helpful" button below. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this lemon.
customer_reviews.text: When I turn on the device prior to going to sleep, sporadically, while I'm sleeping and it's still running, it malfunctions and emits and very loud, high pitched screeching noise. I'm going to try to return it as defective, if it's not exchanged, I'll throw it away. It's woken me up too many times and the whole idea of this purchase is to help me sleep more soundly and fall asleep quicker. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z

customer_reviews.title: This was such a disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me rest heal and sleep after surgery. It Never worked right! I t would work for a few minutes then quit. The sound went off and on. Very cheep I threw mine away very frustrating stressed me out I was tired getting in and out of bed to fix it! 😐 sorry
customer_reviews.author: Teacher of The Word

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $20.
customer_reviews.text: We used this (plugged in, not with batteries) a grand total of 4 nights in our baby’s nursery before it started emitting VERY loud, unpleasant crackling sounds intermittently. Sounded like a mechanical/electrical buzzing, and it would spontaneously emit these sounds much louder than the ocean recording we were playing. Tried other sound options on the machine to no avail. This is the 2nd HoMedics sound spa (diff. models) that has given out with little wear. The other began smoking and smelled like an electrical fire. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Zack S.

customer_reviews.title: Not like the original! New and Cheaper version!
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these for every bed room of the house and have used them for years. Mine recently crapped out so I got this one which looks identical. It isn’t! This is flimsy and the sound sounds like a recording of the old one. I barely turn it on and it’s already super loud. It goes from loud to very loud. It’s a cheap knock off from the original. I’m keeping it because I can’t find the “white noise” option on one that can be plugged in for around $20. I get what I get, I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT GO CEHAP AND BUY THIS! I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT GO CEHAP AND BUY THIS! I bought two of these. The volume knob on both are going out after 6 months. Both units cut in and out during the night. I would also agree with other reviews that there are other sounds in the background of the white noise that will drive you crazy if you notice them. I see the reviews but do not trust this. I have two units and both are faulty and have strange noises. I do not think this is a coincidence.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Berthelot

customer_reviews.title: Creepy Background noises
customer_reviews.text: It bothered me that you couldn’t turn it on and off and keep the volume the same. The power is turned off by turning the volume knob all the way down. The real reason I am returning this: when it was in ‘white noise’ (the only one we use) there were background sounds. My husband thought I was ridiculous when I told him I was hearing ‘sonar’ sounds and the next time a rhythmic swooshing, until he heard the sonar sounds himself. It was actually quite creepy and really strange. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Krombach

customer_reviews.title: Works Good
customer_reviews.text: This works really good and the volume is good that you can raise or lower it. I read other reviews that said it quit working after a few uses. Well, it happened to me. The 3rd night I went to use it I couldnt get it to work! BUT...what I found out is that if you use it the night before, with the timer, it shuts off as expected, but the volume knob is still on. SO turn the volume knob off till it clicks off, and turn it on again and turn the volume up so you can hear it and it will work!! Then set as you wish!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: White noise loop is terrible
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sound machine for the different nature sounds and white noise. After a few days of running the white noise, I began hearing an almost constant ding noise. I thought I was losing my mind from lack of sleep! It wasn’t until my older kiddo accidentally turned the machine on during the day that I finally noticed where it was coming from. Every 3 seconds, a ding noise is played in the white noise. Its maddening. Other reviewers say they hear other noises in the rain (or maybe ocean) sounds. I didn’t stick around to find out. I’m using my niece’s old sound machine.
customer_reviews.author: LMGS

customer_reviews.title: I've had the sounds machine a little over one year ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had the sounds machine a little over one year and a few months ago it started having a short in it. I have to play around with it to make noise and to keep the noise on. I'm so upset because HoMedics website says their warranty is one year and I know Amazon won't do anything. I bought it last February and it is now April. If I would have known their was a warranty I would have returned it before February. It worked perfectly when I got it and I don't know what is happening to it, but it is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought two years ago, and 6 months ago the volume button started to go. It would be playing the noise and then stop playing suddenly. We had to push down on the button to get it to start up again. Now it won't even play. Disappointed. We bought one like this style at Target as it's lasted us 4 years!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B

customer_reviews.title: Looping tune behind white noise
customer_reviews.text: this sound machine has done its job, but the looping tune behind the white noise every few seconds has ruined it for me. Baby only sleeps to the white noise but husband and I cannot (and starting to question if baby would sleep better with something else too). So, so, incredibly annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Pillsbury

customer_reviews.title: Horrible volume level
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little girls bedroom to try and help her sleep at night. This machine would be wonderful if you could actually hear it. Even with the volume all the way up to max, you could barely hear the thing unless you lay it on your bed with you! I wish it was better because the size is perfect and I love the sound options. Instead I immediately returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M

customer_reviews.title: A very nice unit that meets our expectations
customer_reviews.text: I initially heard this unit at our doctor's office and was impressed with the sound quality. And of course, I had to play with it to check it out. Ordered one as soon as I arrived home. Volume is adjustable from barely noticeable to almost annoying, just as I wanted and expected. There is a nice selection of backgrounds sounds to choose from and are smooth and long enough to not create, what I call, the "Repeat" expectation. Our young grandkids love it as they like to sleep late when visiting while we go about our morning routines without worry of waking them.
customer_reviews.author: Bayou Reader

customer_reviews.title: Lowest setting is still very loud
customer_reviews.text: Even at the lowest setting, the volume is very loud. I thought it would be more of a soft white noise in the background, but it sounds like I am camping in a tent on the beach. We bought it for my youngest daughter and she likes it. She turns on her music (that lasts for about 30m) and her Sound Machine. When the music times out, the Sound Machine is still on and the difference in volume isn’t as noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: BROKE AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in November, and it worked SO WELL until last night. We depend on this every night for our baby to sleep, we live in a small house so it enables us to continue walking around the house, watching TV, etc without waking up our very light sleeping baby. Last night, I noticed the baby was crying frequently through the night. I went in the nursery in the morning and noticed the sound was off. Tonight when I turned it on, it has gotten worse. It now has a horribly loud noise playing over the white noise (or any of the sound options). It's clearly broken, HELP! I definitely expect a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Simon

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: I live in townhouse close to a somewhat busy street. I tried several different white noise machine. This is the one I'm finally keeping. This helps reduce the vehicle noise across the street. Compared to other similar products, the good part I like is its volume control and timer. The bad part is I only get used to the white noise, but not other options. This maybe somewhat related to different person's preference though.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Zhu

customer_reviews.title: If you go cheap, you get a cheap product
customer_reviews.text: About what I expected for the price but I will say, the volume control adjust is terrible. I turn on the machine and adjust the volume only to have it turn off. I have to tap it to get it to turn back on and then it blasts me at a higher volume. If you ask me, pay more for a different, more quality machine because this one is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home office as I work at home while my toddler is cared for by our nanny. I figured it would provide a little buffer from hearing each other, but didn’t want to spend $50 for another dohm (which I use in my bedroom for sleep). I actually think this one is better than the dohm! You can modify the volume much more than the dohm and it is more pleasing to look at. I’ll definitely buy this again in the future! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mel V

customer_reviews.title: Huge letdown
customer_reviews.text: Literally plugged this in for the first time yesterday, worked fine but the volume was a bit touchy. Couldn’t seem to easily keep it from being too high or low. The sounds were very relaxing and soothing, our newborn loved it! Turned it off after his nap and it will not turn back on. My husband and I tried half of the outlets in our house thinking it was the outlet in our bedroom. Nope! Trying a replacement and if it is not better I am getting something else. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Takara Vaillancourt

customer_reviews.title: Minor defect.
customer_reviews.text: I love the sounds this produces. But within 3 months it developed a "skip". While you are listening to it the power will cut out. It will remain of for sometimes just 1 second, sometimes over a minute. It is very distracting. But if you adjust the volume control you can get it to an area where it will not skip. I think it is a defect. My daughter prefers the summer cricket noises. I also like the pattern is varied enough that you cannot easily pinpoint the repeat spot. I have a different sound machine that began to keep me awake because I would hear the pattern and begin to predict it.
customer_reviews.author: Kalhana

customer_reviews.title: Devise stooped working 1 month into use
customer_reviews.text: Cute little machine. Purchased it for our little one and it worked. She slept in our room one night with it and it worked on us!!! We loved it, used it every night, she let us have it, lol :) but unfortunately it atop working, the sound cut off after 15 seconds of turning it on and the green power light began to flicker through the night. Become quite frightening. I want another sound machine because sound works! It shut wont be this one. Only lasted 1 full month :(
customer_reviews.author: lady loyal

customer_reviews.title: Super basic. Ok for the price but not a “forever” product
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this for the past year and a half. The unit doesn’t always turn on; we have to turn it of and on several times to get it to work. It seems like there is a wire loose somewhere. I ended up buying a second noise machine (Marpac) for another room and I like it so much better because there are more sound options. However, this unit is really inexpensive, and if you just need basic white noise, this unit would be fine for you. If you’re wanting something with more soothing sounds or actual music, maybe pick something else like a Marpac unit.
customer_reviews.author: StarWorld

customer_reviews.title: Great - until it died
customer_reviews.text: Overall I have LOVED this sound machine. However I have had it for less than two weeks and it is already dying. Primary use has been plugged into the wall, with exception of 2 nights on battery while traveling. A friend of mine has had hers for 9 months with no issues so based on that and other reviews here it apparently just depends on if you happen to get the odd defective one. Will probably end up shelling out for a more expensive one to replace this model so that I can be sure not to have this issue anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Thomas

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Cannot be used outside the U.S.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine, but TRUST ME on this you cannot use this machine with the AC cord outside the U.S. I've destroyed over 4 of these machines abroad as for some reason when a foreign current (Asia, Europe) gets in it, it's destroyed permanently. The problem is if you take 4 batteries, it makes the machine very heavy to pack in your luggage. But if you're using the AC cord in the U.S., it's an awesome machine that lasts YEARS. I've had mine for over 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the baby’s room and to use when traveling with baby so he still has his typical sleep sounds for bedtime. This is great! Small and pretty flat so it won’t take up much space in luggage and can be battery operated so no need to use adaptors if traveling to different countries. Would reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Yon

customer_reviews.title: Bedtime staple
customer_reviews.text: I can't sleep without white noise but I don't always like to use a fan and I don't like to use an app since it kills my phone. I do, however, like to use this! My favorite thing about this handy device is that it's really small which means it's portable for traveling on business. It also gets LOUD which I don't normally use, but having the feature is nice. I also like that I can pick from other noises if I feel like it, though white noise is my favorite. I have three of these, one for each room in my house. Guests like having the option as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Laffey

customer_reviews.title: Believe the reviews!! They are RIGHT! It’s BAD!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews before I bought this thing!! It sucks for people who are light sleepers. Every night I can hear a different noise in the white noise. And it’s true. Once you hear the same repetitive sound in the white noise YOU CAN NOT UNHEAR it and it drives you insane! I had one just like it that lasted me for 10 years and was GREAT till sound cut in and out and I thought it was old which is why I bought this again but man it was a mistake!!
customer_reviews.author: GeorGie D.

customer_reviews.title: Works well when it is working!
customer_reviews.text: I initially really liked this product, and use it to mask the tinnitus in one ear, as well as my husband’s cPap machine. After about a month, one night I was wakened by a very loud crackling/static noise coming from the machine. It was there no matter what sound Effect I selected. I called customer service and they nicely sent me out a replacement machine right away. I have been using that one for about a month, and one morning my husband asked if I’d heard my sound machine making a strange noise in the night. I had not, it do not have high confidence that this one will last very long!
customer_reviews.author: George P. Laufer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but can be fragile
customer_reviews.text: This sound machine has been good. It is small and portable and we love the battery option (we took it camping once and it worked like a charm). We originally bought one when our baby was born and it lasted about a year. I think it was dropped too many times or something because the sound would only turn on if the volume was turned all the way up. We bought another one, because we liked it so much and it has been fine (we've been more careful to not drop it).
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Sadie Jaussi

customer_reviews.title: Started smoking after volume knob issues
customer_reviews.text: Had mine for only about 7 months before it literally started smoking. Not what you want in your infant's bedroom. We unplugged it between uses, used it for rain noises at naptime and bedtime and have new outlets, after this I am very wary of recommending this machine and wish I could have my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: weird back hum with white noise
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten this sound macheine as a chistmas present for my husband as he traveled a lot. the first one he got had a weird background noise when using the white noise part.... I replaced it and this newer on is doing the same thing- there is a weird hum behind the white noise and its all you can focus on. I missed the dead line to return the second which I am bummed about but I will not get another one like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ali B Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great at first...
customer_reviews.text: I first got one of these in 2014 when my daughter was a baby and it worked beautifully. It still does! I bought another one a couple of years later for myself and this one seems like it always "shorts" out... The power is very finicky. I can usually get it to work but it's just weird since the first one I got works perfectly. Judging from this personal experience plus the latest reviews I'm wondering if the product quality has simply declined in recent years....
customer_reviews.author: Sam C

customer_reviews.title: Sounds cut out after less than a year of use
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these over the past year, one for each of our kids' bedrooms. The second one seemed to be defective, the noise constantly cut out, so when I asked for a return the seller promptly sent a replacement. Now, just 5 months after getting the second one and 9 months after the first, they both cut out! They get 1 star for the prompt return and the nice cricket noises. But no more stars because white noise that cuts out defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Got babies? Use this!
customer_reviews.text: My son can’t sleep without background noise. He’s four months old, it’s my fault because I would run the vacuum while he was sleeping. Anyway, I was just playing a lot of white noise sounds on my phone at night but I got tired of my phone overheating. This is a great alternative and I’m really not sure why I didn’t do this from the beginning!!! We are using it right now on white noise!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Jo Wood

customer_reviews.title: First one was defective
customer_reviews.text: We had to send this back for a replacement. Not sure if it had a short in it but it would sputter and stop working abruptly for no reason. The only thing that would wake it would be to jiggle the volume dial but then it would get super loud. Not ideal when you are trying to get a baby to sleep. The replacement seems to work alright so far. Hoping the first one was a rare defect.
customer_reviews.author: J&H

customer_reviews.title: Defective machine possibly?
customer_reviews.text: This is my second machine to buy. The last one broke after several years. I loved it! I received my new one and slept one night with it. The white noise has a weird high pitch almost hypnotizing noise in the background. Very strange. My last machine did not do this .
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great... for a while.
customer_reviews.text: While it worked it was great. The sound is good but we use it every night and it must not be designed for that because it only lasted a year before it started cutting in and out and at times just shutting off. It was like there was a short in it or something because if you adjusted the volume at all it would come back on. The problem is that my little one wakes up when it turns off. That's a problem and totally defeats the purpose of having it. If you are getting this for short term or occasional use it's great but I'd look elsewhere is this is a permanent fixture in a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Spiegel

customer_reviews.title: Works for sleeping and for office white noise.
customer_reviews.text: So I first bought this for home because I missed sleeping to the sound of the ocean. This did the charm and the adjustable volume had been great for both me and my hubby. We have used it for nearly 10 years. We needed one at work so I brought this in from home to give it a shot. It was perfect! Everyone likes it and we went ahead and purchased them for the office. Guess I should have tried it years ago! Hahah
customer_reviews.author: Sandytoes

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son has anxiety and sleeping is a challenge for him, I did my research and with help from his pediatrician, we came up with a few things to help him sleep through the night. This was a great buy, he goes everywhere with it (travel, grandparents house). The volume he regulates based on the surrounding, it's easy to use and while he may only choose one sound, I find myself using the others for short naps. He sleeps through the night and I'm grateful I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Anna-Kay Chow

customer_reviews.title: Used for my new office suite
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my new office suite which is for a group practice of therapists. Since we must do everything possible to protect our clients' privacy, I had my contractor install electrical outlets high up next to the doors and then hung these white noise machines near the outlets. They have multiple sound options (ocean, rain, thunder, regular white noise/static, etc.) and are sleek and unobtrusive on the wall. They work very well. I had the same kind at home for my grandchildren when they sleep over and I've never had any problems with this model. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed, won’t last.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this thing twice in the last year because I like the rain sound for my baby, she sleeps with it all night. However due to the construction of this thing the volume knob starts to lose connectivity or something. After a while you turn the knob on the light turns on and there’s no sound or you have to play with it like a surgeon just to get the right angle for it to actually make noise. Also the sound will start to glitch when the batteries die that’s normal but it’ll always do it at ungodly times in the morning and wake my kid up.
customer_reviews.author: Olgapet

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this because I now work from home
customer_reviews.text: As we're all on COVID alert and working from home, I don't have a 'quiet space' from which to work. So I bought this to drown out the sounds of the TV and other every noises at home. Works great. Can just leave it on or switch to the time mode if using it for sleep. The sounds are pretty continuous so you can't easily identify when the loop starts over again.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: One received is poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this because we have the same one purchased from bath and body works. The one from Amazon has some sort of connection issue with the cord. It goes in and out. You have to use the dial like a tuner trying to get a station to come in. Not fun when trying to put a newborn to sleep. A few times she woke up because I finally found the sound and it was mega loud.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea King

customer_reviews.title: I do like this product but it has a loose connection on ...
customer_reviews.text: I do like this product but it has a loose connection on the on off knob and sometimes stops or gets intermittent. Mostly it works and I use it. I would have exchanged for another one as but I missed the 30 day window. I like the sounds so wish I had been able to trade it out.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning volume control
customer_reviews.text: Have tried two of these and they both have the same issue with volume control! The volume does fine for a while but in middle of the night noise dies down and volume knob doesn’t work/ help!!! So frustrating!!! I’m sending my second one back for a refund too!
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage
customer_reviews.text: The third one has now just randomly died after 3 months of use. I kept buying it because everything about it is perfect for what we need and I just wanted to hope that there was a way to be careful enough with it that it would last. Well this one was put in one spot where nothing would ever come near it, we never touch it other than the power button, it was not disturbed or shaken in any way, and it still died on us. Such a crap product.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaD

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: This little noisemaker is exactly as described. It has several sounds (I like rain the best) and full volume control. I always plug it in, since I do not trust battery operation of any except a flashlight. I cannot comment on "sleep quality" since that has nothing to do with the machine. Some people do not sleep well in a quiet room. If you are one of those folks, this will help.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Carlucci

customer_reviews.title: Great sound machine, for the price. (We have 2!)
customer_reviews.text: We bought one of these sound machines 2 years ago to help our son sleep through the night as an infant and he has been using it ever since. Recently we had our second baby boy, And bought a second one! This sound machine is nothing fancy but it does the trick for creating white noise and has an easy volume adjustment. There are several sound options but the sound quality is nothing special. We just stick with the plain white noise and everybody sleeps better in our house because of it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon and Amy

product_meta.title: White Noise Sound Machine | Portable Sleep Therapy for Home , Office , Baby & Travel | 6 Relaxing & Soothing Nature Sounds , Battery or Adapter Charging Options , Auto-Off Timer | HoMedics Sound Spa
product_meta.description:
Color:SilverSince our beginnings in 1987, HoMedics has created, innovated and refined a remarkable line of personal wellness products to become the recognized #1 Brand in Massage. But massage is not all we do. HoMedics has a full line of in-home wellness products that are uniquely designed to promote your well-being; including: Air Filters, humidifiers, sleep aids, fitness monitors, and more.
The HoMedics White Noise Sound Machine offers 6 different nature sounds including: White Noise, Thunder, Ocean, Rain, Summer Night, and Brook. The white noise machine features an adjustable volume setting allowing you to easily relax or fall asleep, even with undesirable background noise. 
The SoundSpa supports multiple power settings. It can be plugged into a wall outlet with its adapter (included) or powered by 4 'AA' batteries (not included). The HoMedics SS-2000 white noise machine is designed with an auto-off feature. Set the timer to 15, 30, or 60 minutes. Or, if you choose, leave your noise machine on all night!

Our Sleep Sound Machine is small enough to fit into any purse or travel bag. Bring your relaxation sounds with you when you travel to create a peaceful "At Home" ambiance. This works for adults, kids, and babies!
HoMedics SoundSpa sounds are created to mimic the natural environment and provide the most relaxing experience for you. Enjoy these sounds whether you are trying to sleep, relax or study. Our natural sounds work great for calming down your baby as well. It makes the perfect addition to any nursery. The rhythmic sounds instill a feeling of comfort that lulls people of all ages to sleep, with a built-in auto-off timer.
feature_bullets: 6 Soothing Sounds: Choose from 6 digitally recorded relaxing Sounds: White Noise, Thunder, Ocean, Rain, Summer Night, and Brook; The Soundspa's Sounds are Designed to mimic the natural environment to provide the most relaxing Experience possible

Compact & Portable FOR Travel: Don’t worry about Not Sleeping while you Travel, the Homedics Sleep Sound Machine is Small and Lightweight; It easily fits into Your purse, Bag or suitcase making it Easy to bring Your Sleep Sounds with you wherever you go

Helps Your Baby Sleep : Add the Soundspa's rhythmic nature noises to your baby's Sleep routine to help them fall aSleep faster and stay aSleep longer; The stylish, dark blue color looks great in any room including your child's nursery;The nature sounds will help lull your baby to Sleep whether it's nap Time or night Time; A Sleeping baby means more Sleep for the Whole family

Auto Off Timer : The Homedics Sound Machine’s therapeutic Sounds can be used for relaxation, Sleep, work, Travel, study or meditation; You can choose to Play the relaxation Sounds continuously, or choose from the auto off Timer. The Timer Features 3 Options: 15, 30, or 60 minutes. It can be plugged into a wall outlet with the adapter (Included) or Powered by 4 ‘AA’ batteries (Not Included)

WHAT’S Included: Homedics Soundspa White Noise Sleep Machine; Wall outlet adapter; 30 day money back Guarantee; Caution keep cord away from heated surfaces; To reduce the risk of burns, fire and electric shock use this appliance only for its intended use as described in this manual; Do Not use attachments Not Recommended by Homedics specifically any attachments Not provided with the unit ; Natural Sounds help you relax while you read, work, study or Sleep

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
